model.element.mobile

Class Mobile

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.element.Element
      • model.element.mobile.Mobile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IElement, IMobile, IPawn, ISquare
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Door, EnergyBall, Monster, MyCharacter, Purse, Spell

    public abstract class Mobile
extends Element
implements IMobile

    The Mobile class

    Author:
    Christophe CHICHMANIAN
